Article 3: ‘dynamic stability’ is a common term including the rotor angle stability, frequency stability and voltage stability;
‘dynamic stability’ is a common term including therotor angle stability,frequency stabilityandvoltage stability;
Article 38: 1.   Each TSO shall monitor the dynamic stability of the transmission system by studies conducted offline in accordance with paragraph 6. Each TSO shall exchange the relevant data for monitoring the dynamic stability of the transmission system with the other TSOs of its synchronous area.
